FundingOppParticipant.name: FundingOppParticipant
FundingOppParticipant.description: Represents information about a user or group of participants who have access to a funding opportunity.

Comments.description: The comments about why the participant has access to the funding opportunity.

FundingOpportunityId.description: The funding opportunity associated with the funding opportunity participant.

IsParticipantActive.description: Indicates whether the funding opportunity participant is currently active (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.

Name.description: The name of the funding opportunity participant.

ParticipantId.description: The participant associated with the funding opportunity.

ParticipantRoleId.description: The participant role associated with the funding opportunity participant.
